notes.text: We've increased the data load threshold to 500 values for the value help dropdown list
We now show an illustrated message if there is no data in a table
We now ensure that the Adapt Filters button works correctly with the FilterBar building block
We now show an illustrated message when no data is available in a chart
End users can now use the up and down arrow keys to select options in the Editing Status filter
We now support the table copy in all value help dialogs
We've resolved an issue where the checkbox selection for multi-input fields wasn't working correctly
We've resolved an issue with the columns referencing navigation properties that don't have a property type
We've resolved an issue with adding a filter to a filter bar variant.
We've now enabled the handling of side effects for custom form elements specified in the manifest
The message popover for tables now displays information about multiple columns and columns that have been hidden using table personalization
We now show the label from the manifest or annotations in the Adapt Filters dialog
We now consider the sort order for custom data from SortRestriction of value help, if it isn't included in the presentation variant
We now support additional formats for date and time-based controls
We've resolved an issue where the in-app state didnâ€™t update when navigating from an external app
The table export now works correctly after a create action
We now support key user adaptation for actions
We now ensure that the Table API works correctly with the UploadSetwithTable plugin
We now deactivate optimistic batch requests when initialLoad is set to Disabled in the manifest
We've resolved an issue with value help columns referencing navigation properties with text annotations
We now display an appropriate message after changes are saved in the mass edit dialog
The main navigation and additional links in a quick view now provide implicit semantic object mapping when a dynamic semantic object is used
You can now define whether a link opens in a new tab or window, or in the same frame, the parent frame, or the full window of the same tab.
We now correctly wrap the header text in the ObjectStatus control if it is longer than the available screen width
We now ensure that the items included in the FileWrapper are treated as one control by screen readers
We now ensure that screen readers correctly read out the information of empty fields with a quick view
Visual filters now work correctly if the aggregatable property is hidden
We now merge the subsection title with the collection facet if the section title is empty
We've resolved an issue with adding a filter field at runtime
We now ensure the correct size of DataPoints is used in the object page header
We now correctly align the Datapoint in the object page header
Custom filters now work correctly without a context path
